The power supply of component B1 (foot control) has a short circuit to ground.
The power supply of component B1 (foot control) has a short circuit to ground.
The signal line 2 of component B1 (foot control) has an interruption, short circuit to positive or short circuit to earth.
The pin A3.X4.40/29 on the control unit A3 (control unit cruise control (CPC)) is short-circuited to ground.
Component B1 (foot controller) is defective.
The control unit A3 (Driving Control Unit (CPC)) is defective.
The control unit A3 (Driving Control Unit (CPC)) is defective.
The Can-Bus (CAN 4 (drive CAN) ) has a malfunction
The control unit A3 (Driving Control Unit (CPC)) is defective.
Accelerator pedal stops working at times
No communication with the ESP ecu possible
The ecu does not respond to the XENTRY Diagnosis request.
Other fault on request
